Author: SpheneDev
Name: Sphene
Description: Through the power of Living Memory, this plugin harmonizes your Penumbra modifications and Glamourer configurations across all connected souls, ensuring endless synchronization in your shared digital realm.
Punchline: Become Endless. Return to Living Memory.
Changelog:
- Implement window width locking functionality with dragable width
- Add new paused syncshell state handling in incognito mode
- Added Online user Count for your Paired Users.
- Improve folder width consistency across UI components
- Add syncshell indicators for visible pairs
- Enhance group folder styling and button positioning
